sentence: "Another day another false ad from Trump
The truth is Trumps plan actually raises taxes on millions of middle class families especially working single moms and dads and showers the wealthy with huge tax cuts
Hillary Clinton has pledged not to raise taxes on the middle class and will work to build an economy that works for everyone not just those at the top

This stands in strong contrast to Donald Trump who apparently did not pay a cent in federal income taxes for nearly 20 years and is now trying to hide the fact that his economic plan represents a huge boon to the very wealthy."
